thread.title: Video: Bash Ali slams Solomon Dalung, calls him criminal, area-boy
thread.title_full: Video: Bash Ali slams Solomon Dalung, calls him criminal, area-boy

author: Okogba
title: Video: Bash Ali slams Solomon Dalung, calls him criminal, area-boy
text:
Home » Videos » Video: Bash Ali slams Solomon Dalung, calls him criminal, area-boy Video: Bash Ali slams Solomon Dalung, calls him criminal, area-boy On 4:14 pm In Videos by Okogba Comments 
Former boxing champion, Bash Ali didn’t take it easy on Sports Minister, Solomon Dalung, who he said gave him an appointment and refused to see him. 
In the video, police officers and on-lookers could been seen pacifying the boxer with some condemning the act of the minister saying he was fond of such behaviour. 
See video below…
